title: We Pack a Picnic
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 25 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: What would you pack in your picnic basket? We Pack a Picnic shows the food two friends pack for their picnic. Students have the opportunity to ask and answer questions as they read this book. Detailed, supportive illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support beginning readers.
reviewWords: apples, carrots, cheese, crackers, drinks, grapes, pack, picnic, sandwiches
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
